purpleculture_info: Pictographic: A foot æ­¢ with a leg on top
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: Jade -inscription on elephant foot, from thigh to foot, the original meaning is foot. " Foot " and "ç–‹" are the same characters in the Jia Jin inscription. The characters of the Warring States period began to differentiate, and the upper part of the word " foot " was written in a " mouth " shape, and the upper part of the word "ç–‹" was written in a circle or "ãƒ" shape (Ji Xusheng).

Oracle is used as the original meaning, "Collection" 775 reversed: "Illness", which means that there is a disease. Handed down documents are also used as the original meaning, "Guan Zi. Discipleship: "Ask the stubbornness", referring to the disciple serving the teacher to rest, and asking the teacher where his feet are (Qiu Xigui). "Shuowen": "Suffocation, foot. The upper is like the calf, the bottom is to stop. The "disciple position" says: "Ask the suffocation." The ancient prose thought the word "Poetry. Big suffocation", and also considered the full character, or Xu The word. One says naruto, remember it. All the genus of naruto is from naruto."

Oracle is also used as a name.

Bronze is pronounced " Xu ", which means assistance and free from stigmatization: "Lingnv (ru) ç–‹ (èƒ¥) Zhoushi" means ordering you to assist the army of the Zhou Dynasty. "Er Ya. Interpretation: "Xu, Xiangye." "Dialect": "Xu, Fuye."

Also known as " Sparse ", "Guodian Chujian. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 28: "Ancient (there) is not available but new (pro), and it is also not available (sparse)." "Mawangdui silk book. I "and B of this, Wang Bi this" I "," Piece Goods "as" sparse . "

Also known as " Ju ", "Shangbo Bamboo Book I." Confucius Poems" Jane 10: "Guan Tu (Juan) to Se Yu (Yu) Yu Feng (Li)". "Guan Tu" is the title of the "Book of Songs" "Guan Ju", which means that "Guan Ju" can use the preference for beauty to illustrate the importance of ritual (Ji Xusheng). Also used as a name, "Guodian Chu Jian. "Qiang Da Yi Shi" Jane 9: "Zixu (Xu)", that is, Wu Zixu, the famous official of the State of Wu.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscription on the elephant foot, from the thigh to the foot, the original meaning is foot.
